price: Yεde Nokorε na esianee (Qur’aan) no, na εde Nokorε nso na εbaeε. Deε enti Yεsomaa woͻ ne sε, fa (ͻsoro Aheman no mu) anigyesεm bεhyԑ (agyidiefoͻ no) bᴐ, na fa (asotwee no nso ho asεm no) bͻ (amanfoͻ no) kͻkͻ.
arabic: وَبِٱلۡحَقِّ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ وَبِٱلۡحَقِّ نَزَلَۗ وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wabil-ḥaqi anzalnāhu wabil-ḥaqi nazala wamā arsalnāka illā mubashiran wanadhīran
